title: *** Disabling the score information in relay ***

content.raw:
We're looking to disable the relay of score information \(see [PR #252](#!/osrf/subt/pull-requests/252/disable-score-information-in-relay/diff)\). This will prevent the **Team Solution** docker container from seeing the score information through the `/subt/score` ROS topic in the [Cloudsim environment](#!/osrf/subt/wiki/cloudsim_architecture).  However, if you are doing local development, then you can still subscribe to the Igition `subt/score` topic.

This should not affect the development of your controller\(s\), but post back here any comments or concerns.  Thanks!
